value: Industry Assistant Professor of Computer Science & Engineering

I am an Industry Assistant Professor at NYU Tandon School of Engineering specializing in cybersecurity, hardware security, and responsible AI. With 20+ years in technology and entrepreneurship, I co-founded the crowdfunding platform RocketHub (acquired 2015) and served as Managing Partner at early stage venture fund Stacked Capital. My interdisciplinary work spans hardware security, AI ethics, governance of emerging technologies, and conflict resolution; combining technical expertise with policy experience, including expert testimony before U.S. Congress on the JOBS Act.
